name: mergely
description: Merge and diff documents online editor and Javascript library that highlights changes in similar texts.It can be used within your own web application to compare files, text, C, C++, Java, HTML, XML, CSS, and Javascript.
readme:
# Mergely
**An online diff/merge application**

Mergely is an online diff/merge editor and Javascript library that highlights changes in similar texts.

It can be used within your own web application to compare files, text, C, C++, Java, HTML, XML, CSS, and Javascript.
